tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have a chipping of a pre molar and a filling had to be redone on an adjacent tooth. I went to the Sahakar Nagar clinic on 13th July. Dr Prina Khanna was assigned to me. She seemed very young and I was skeptical at first but turned out that she was very professional *** **************
She explained the details of the dental issue after an x-ray and scan. The recommended procedure was explained in good detail along with the options for a cap with pricing. I was given a local anesthetic which was done with minimal discomfort. Overall good experience.
Had been to check one of my tooth . He explained the issue and solutions  and also gave me sometime to think on the procedure. The issue was well understood by the staff and Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I underwent a dental surgery for cyst removal. 
Dr. Baswaraj Biradar suggested for a root canal and minor surgery to remove the cyst and dental crowns.

Dr. Baswaraj Biradar and his doctors are very friendly and provided detailed information on the issue and procedures needed.  
The treatment was extremely satisfactory and I would recommended Impressions Sahakar Nagar for any dental problems.
Doctor was very friendly.... And the way hi explain it's awesome.... He talk to me very politely... Staff members is also very nice.... All are very friendly.... Clinic is also very good...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Will recommend this dentist, have lost my fears of getting dental treatments since I have met Dr. Baswaraj & his team.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: **** **** **** **** ******* ****** ***** ******* ****** **** **** ****** ******* * got a tooth filling done for my mother which came out the next day … doctor just inspects and his novice interns do the real procedure who should be practising in supervision and not operating in isolation… previous had stayed for good 4 years from a clinic in my home town … doctor was very pushy to go for an expensive capping for tooth and thankfully we didn’t go for it … **** ******* ****** **** *** ******* *** ********* **** ****** **** ********** *** ** ** ** *** **** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** *** **** ****** ********** ********* ** ********** **** ****** ****** **** ************ ********* *********** ******** Total hygiene is maintained at all levels. Costing is at par / the best as compared to others.Dr Basavaraj Biradar is a highly experienced doctor full of energy, utmost excellence in every treatment he does with full care, and attention to each patient visits Impressions Dental Specialties.I had done my root canal and tooth implant through Impressions Dental Specialties, and my experience was the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dentures ( Metal Based )  Dental Services/ Ful Dental (Acrylic) / Teeth Whitening,
review: Visiting impressions dental clinic and meeting Doctor Biradar was a game changer for my mom's ailing denture issues. With his extensive experience in denture making, he meticulously explained all the details of the procedure with correct outset of each sitting and listed undertaken work in our visit to the clinic. He is a great advisor in providing day to day use cases for optimal use of dentures while also taking great care of aesthetics of the finished product. The natural look of the finished product is impressive and beautiful. Thanks Doctor, we shall visit you soon again for a full family checkup.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very bad experience , my daughter visited for tooth pain . She had filling done twice in that tooth and was suggested for root canal by another doctor . So she visited to get second opinion. The doctor was not patient enough to listen to her at all and just sent her giving a paste saying she has sensitive gum where has she had a real tooth problem . Again my mother had come from native and was suffering with bad toothache , she was asked by doctor to take an X-ray but when they went to show the X-ray were asked to come after a week inspite of she saying she has bad toothache . Very unprofessional..! and was very disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Me and my family have been visiting here for dental procedures.Always have a great experience here. The staff is always welcoming and friendly,they took utmost care and precautions during covid times.The professionalism of the doctors are much appreciated. I have been to other dentists that exaggerated what my needs were, but here the doctors are very honest about the treatment procedures!Dr Sanjana, took her time to explain the complications and what kind of treatment would be suitable for me.She made sure I didn't have to go through a lot of pain during the process. I wish I switched to them sooner. Definitely recommend this place for any dental procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
He has been our family doctor and he did my fathers all teeth and my father did this when he's was above sixty and would ne er visit a dentist..I took him to dr boarder and next is history he is friend to him now ...donno how many root canals...extractions etc everything.
With my daughter he stood for more than one hour holding her hand when the other doctor was doing the surgery...there us a lot to say...my teeth were spoiled by muscat doc and in one sitting he just did it ...he is amazing...god bless him

Cleaning 1000
Filling 1500 per teeth
Teeth Xray 450
Some treatment* 350

For me total 4800. Treatment is good i went 11:30am its got over by 2:00pm 

I need a filling in between 2 teeth which they charged 3000. I thought i will get a discount on this treatment. But they charged for 2 teeth.

Busy hours 11:00am - 4pm

Total 4800 cost for me. Rest everything is good doctor, staff, infrastructure etc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I used to have a lot of teeth pain and I came here then I took a appointment and they got me set up with root canal and they got me a cap 11 years back and till now I come here to this place if I have any issues 
Definitely would recommend this place
Thank you

An amazing experience overall. Highly recommend the doctor to everyone with any dental issue! We had been to another dentist before visiting this place and I must say there is a vast difference in both. Loved the overall process. Thank you doctors and team ! :)

V cheerful atmosphere with music ( old songs ) .whole team is v friendly and dedicated. Basket of thanks to you & your team for serving the humanity since more than 27 years.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Overall experience of booking an appointment and staff behaviour was good. The doctor is approachable and spends good amount of time in understanding the symptoms. Doctor clearly explained the procedure that would be performed as part of the treatment and made me feel comfortable throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Doctor is  professional    gentle.and friendly. Maintains  a very clean and hygienic clinic. All the staff and other doctors are very cooperative and helpful and kind.  Efficient and.polite front desk. Appointments are handled promptly and waiting time.is.minimal.. Fees is transparent and no negotiations.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: We visited the clinic for extraction of a temporary tooth of my son which hadn’t fallen off inspite of the permanent tooth being nearly fully grown behind. Dr Basawaraj was clear in his explanations and recommendations to take care of the teeth going forward and Dr Shruti, who did the extraction, was very good with my 8 year old. The injection and extraction were virtually painless. Very happy with my visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: The doctor is very friendly.  All safety precautions for COVID19 is taken care.  They provide covers/gloves to cover the foot, head and hand.  Equipments are modern, especially aerosol extractor for protection from spread of aerosol.  He explained all the process clearly.  Waiting time is very minimum.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The procedure was carried out smoothly .All the necessary steps are explained before carrying out the procedure . They use the latest technology . My root canal treatment was almost a painless procedure . The doctor is very friendly and is so calm . And the RCT was done in less than 20 min. Very happy with the treatment and I would definitely recommend the doctor  to all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited "Impressions Dental Specialities" Sahakaranagar, Bangalore in Nov/Dec 2019. My case involved extraction of 23 teeth and fixing complete dentures.  I thank very much Dr Baswaraj Biradar for his professionalism, superb quality of service, courtesy and care.  The procedure requireed 7 visits and they were well arranged without any need for waiting.  Besides chewing, the dentures have given an aesthetic look.
U Krishna Rao, retd DGM (Finance) Dept of Telecom

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The clinic maintained very good sanitization protocol during this crisis situation. The doctor explained my condition very nicely and the surgeon was also  experienced. I was very afraid of tooth extraction but they explained me the process in depth and assured me that there is no need to panic. During surgery also I was continuously asked whether I am facing any difficulty or not. I was quite satisfied the way they dealt with my entire surgery. All staffs are also very helpful and I was continuously monitored and never left unattended. Post surgery guidance was also given in very details and nicely. Overall I am very happy with the entire process.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,

Good environment, comfortable treatment, good staff. Affordable cost of treatment.  Happy to recommend to needy persons.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Arrogance and authority are not hall marks of success. In a survey conducted years back, among 20000 companies across the world, only 13 companies were noted for their excellence. Impressions dental care under the leadership of Dr. Basavaraj Biradar loudly exhibits its strengths such as good customer service, result-oriented leadership and quality results, and my experience tells me that this organization will make its mark in the coming years in the dental care.

review:
Had a number of visits with the doctor but treatment was not satisfactory, every time there was an issue. ***** **** *** *** **** ******** ******* ****** ********* **** ** * ***** Thereafter again he put a crown after RCT which was under warranty and costed quite a lot broke down in 2-3 months.
Due to COVID could not visit him immediately later on warranty has been denied.
But every visit I was charged a fee **** ** **** ******* ** ***** **** **** ******Will not recommend him to anybody.
